task_12.description: Move the blue paper cup to the center of the table, avoiding the red tissue
task_12.initial_setup: The blue cup is upright on the far left corner, 25 cm from the edge. The red tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the center of the table. A green plastic cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge.
task_12.final_state: The blue cup is placed directly on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. The red tissue is moved to the far right corner.
